name: P17
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated camera mounted under roof eave, suburban home backyard with patio and lawn at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They enter through the back gate and walk across the backyard toward the house. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering patio and yard, wide-angle with slight edge softening, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 18-second duration.
